Package org.realityforge.arez.annotations

This package contains annotations used by the annotation processor to generate model elements.

See: Description

  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Injectible
    Enum to control when injectible elements should be present.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Action
    Methods marked with this annotation are invoked in an Arez transaction.
    ArezComponent
    Annotation that marks classes to be processed by Arez annotation processor.
    Autorun
    Methods marked with this annotation are converted to autoruns.
    ComponentId
    Annotate the method that should return the Id for Arez component.
    ComponentName
    Annotate the method that will be overridden to provider the debug name for the Arez component.
    ComponentRef
    Marks a template method that returns the Component instance for the component.
    ComponentTypeName
    Annotate the method that will be overridden to return the value of ArezComponent.name().
    Computed
    Methods marked with this annotation are ComputedValues within Arez.
    ComputedValueRef
    Marks a template method that returns the ComputedValue instance for the Computed annotated property.
    ContextRef
    Marks a template method that returns the ArezContext instance for component.
    Observable
    Annotation applied to methods that expose an Observable value in Arez.
    ObservableRef
    Marks a template method that returns the Observable instance for the Observable annotated property.
    ObserverRef
    Marks a template method that returns the Observer instance for the associated Track or Autorun annotated method.
    OnActivate
    Identifies method that is called when the ComputedValue changes from the INACTIVE state to any other state.
    OnDeactivate
    Identifies method that is called when the ComputedValue changes to the INACTIVE state from any other state.
    OnDepsChanged
    Identifies method that will be invoked when the dependencies of the paired @Track annotated method are changed.
    OnDispose
    Identifies method that is called when the ComputedValue is disposed.
    OnStale
    Identifies method that is called when the ComputedValue changes from the UP_TO_DATE state to STALE or POSSIBLY_STALE.
    PostDispose
    Annotation to identify method invoked after disposing element.
    PreDispose
    Annotation to identify method invoked prior to disposing element.
    Repository
    Annotation that indicates that a repository must be generated for component.
    Track
    Methods marked with this annotation are run in tracking transactions.

Package org.realityforge.arez.annotations Description

This package contains annotations used by the annotation processor to generate model elements.
